h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince
content: If you hear him start to yell at a distance, be prepared for a charge attack that comes with a three hit smashing sweep attack, and wait until his final attack to retaliate with your own combo attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince'.
The content is as follows:
If you hear him start to yell at a distance, be prepared for a charge attack that comes with a three hit smashing sweep attack, and wait until his final attack to retaliate with your own combo attack.
